See also: Rechts

Dutch[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /rɛxts/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Etymology 1[edit]

Genitive form of recht.

Adverb[edit]

rechts

  1. on the right
    Zie je die auto rechts?
    Do you see the car on the right?
  2. to the right
    Bij het volgende verkeerslicht rechts afslaan.
    Turn right at the next traffic light.
    We gaan naar rechts.
    We're going to the right.
Antonyms[edit]
  • links

Etymology 2[edit]

(This etymology is missing. Please add to it, or discuss it at the Etymology scriptorium.)

Adjective[edit]

rechts (comparative rechtser, superlative meest rechts or rechtst)

  1. (not comparable) right
    Er zit een vlek op je rechter schoen.
    There’s a spot on your right shoe.
  2. rightist, belonging to the ideological right
    Dat zijn rechtse ideeën.
    Those are rightist ideas.
  3. (predicatively) right-handed
    Ik ben rechts, je kan niet met mijn pen schrijven.
    I'm right-handed, you cannot write with my pen.

Synonyms[edit]
  • (right): rechter
  • (right-handed): rechtshandig

Adverb[edit]

rechts

  1. on the right
    Siehst du das Auto rechts?
    (please add an English translation of this usage example)
  2. to the right
    An der nächsten Ampel rechts abbiegen.
    (please add an English translation of this usage example)
  3. the right-hand side
    Wir gehen nach rechts.
    (please add an English translation of this usage example)
  4. pars pro toto for right-wing extremist
  5. pertaining to the political right
